T03D3820:293a-6: don gyi gdams ngag 'di mtshan nyid kyi theg pa
T03D3820:293a-7: yin nam sngags kyi theg pa yin zhes the tshom
T03D3820:293a-8: za na / sems can rnams kyi blo'i snang ba
T03D3820:293a-9: la tha dad du snang mod kyi zab mo'i chos
T03D3820:293a-10: nyid la tha dad med de /
T03D3820:293a-11: de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3820:293a-12: phyin pa'i sngags 'di ni gsang sngags rnams kyi don
T03D3820:293a-14: de rtogs par byed pa rig pa chen po'i sngags
T03D3820:293a-15: zhes bya ba ni rig pa dran pa snang ba
T03D3820:293a-17: chen po ni nam mkha' dang 'dra la /
T03D3820:293a-18: zab pa ngos bzung ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sngags so //
T03D3820:293a-19: bla na med pa'i sngags zhes bya ba ni dran pa dang /
T03D3820:293a-22: nyams su myong bas ma gos pa gang gis kyang
T03D3820:293a-23: ma non pas bla na med pa'i sngags ni stong
T03D3820:293a-24: pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sngags so //
T03D3820:293a-25: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags zhes bya ba
T03D3820:293a-26: ni ma dran pa yang ma byung bas ma skyes
T03D3820:293a-27: pa'o // ma skyes pa'i phyir gang dang mnyam pa
T03D3820:293a-28: med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags ni
T03D3820:293a-29: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sngags so//
T03D3820:293a-30: sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i
T03D3820:293a-31: sngags ni sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyi ye shes kyis
T03D3820:293a-33: rnam par rtog pa dang mi rtog par yang mi
T03D3820:293a-34: mdzad pas na sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi
T03D3820:293a-35: bar byed pa'i sngags ni smon pa med pa'i ting
T03D3820:293a-36: nge 'dzin gyi sngags bzhi'i don to //
T03D3820:293a-37: de dag bka' dang lung tha dad pa la lta
T03D3820:293a-38: zhing bsams pas khams gsum gyi sems can rnams kyi
T03D3820:293a-39: bde sdug la lta zhing skyo ba skye ba'am /
T03D3820:293a-40: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi che
T03D3820:293a-41: ba'i yon tan gyi rnam pa thos nas spro ba
T03D3820:293a-42: skye ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa sgyu ma
T03D3820:293a-43: lta bu ma brtags kyi bar du nyams dga' bas
T03D3820:293a-44: ni mi brdzun ba zhes bya'o //
T03D3820:293a-45: de yang skyo ba ni zhe sdang ba yin la //
T03D3820:293a-46: spro ba ni 'dod chags yin te /
T03D3820:293a-47: de gnyis rang gi dran pa yin par ngo ma shes pas gti mug yin /
T03D3820:293a-48: dper na 'dod chags la mngon par dga' ba'i skyes
T03D3820:293a-49: bu'i don du rmi lam na bud med yid du
T03D3820:293a-50: 'ong pa'am / sman gyi rnam pas byas pa'i bud med dam /
T03D3820:293b-0: shing @293b sna tshogs pas byas pa'i bud med de dag gis skyes bu'i don byed de /
T03D3820:293b-1: de'i rjes la brtags shing dpyad pas bud med de dag kyang med la /
T03D3820:293b-2: de las byung ba'i nyams su myong ba de yang med do //
T03D3820:293b-3: de bzhin du spro ba'i sems kyang nyams dga' zhing bde ba la brtags pas mi bden pa'o //
T03D3820:293b-4: dper na ri mo mkhan mkhas pa zhig gis ras
T03D3820:293b-5: la sogs pa'i gzhi ma zhig la khro bo 'jigs
T03D3820:293b-6: su rung ba zhig bris pa la rang gis bltas
T03D3820:293b-7: pas bred cing shin tu 'jigs so //
T03D3820:293b-8: skyo ba'i sems kyang de bzhin no //
T03D3820:293b-9: de bas na skyo ba dang spro ba la yid
T03D3820:293b-10: ches pa'i gang zag rnams kyi don du rgyu 'bras
T03D3820:293b-11: sam / las 'das pa las kyi rnam par smin pa mi brdzun pas na zhes gsungs so //
T03D3820:293b-12: bden pa mthong ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi
T03D3820:293b-13: don du ni don dam par na las kyang med
T03D3820:293b-14: / las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med do zhes bka' las gsungs so //
T03D3820:293b-15: de bas na brgyud pa'i gdams ngag las dran pa'i
T03D3820:293b-16: chos rnams ni sgyu ma lta bur snang la rang
T03D3820:293b-17: bzhin med pa'o // ma dran pa'i chos rnams ni zab cing mi snang la rang bzhin yod pa'o //
T03D3820:293b-18: de'i phyir dran pa'i chos sgyu ma tsam du don byed nus la mi brdzun pas so //
T03D3820:293b-19: dran pas ma gos pa zab mo'i chos nyid kyis
T03D3820:293b-20: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bstan pas ni bden
T03D3820:293b-22: dper na smig rgyu'i chu bo chen po las rgal
T03D3820:293b-23: bar 'dod pa'i gang zag gis mnyan pa bos nas
T03D3820:293b-24: gru dang bcas te smig rgyu'i chu bo chen po'i
T03D3820:293b-26: kye skyes bu khyod kyis chu bo chen po 'di
T03D3820:293b-27: las sgrol cig khyod ci dbang ba'i rngan pa sbyin
T03D3820:293b-29: mnyan pa des 'o na nga la rngan pa slong shig ces byas pas byin no //
T03D3820:293b-30: de nas mnyan pa des skyes bu de'i mig phyis
T03D3820:293b-31: pas smig rgyu'i chu bo chen po de med par
T03D3820:293b-32: gyur to // de bzhin du las dang las kyi
T03D3820:293b-33: rnam par smin pa las gyur pa'i 'khor rnam gsum
T03D3820:293b-34: gyi chu bo chen po las rgal bar 'dod pa'i
T03D3820:293b-35: skyes bu rnams kyis thabs dang /
T03D3820:293b-36: shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
T03D3820:293b-37: drung du song nas bdag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi
T03D3820:293b-38: chu bo chen po las bsgral bar zhu /
T03D3820:293b-39: khyed kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin bgyid do zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3820:293b-40: dge ba'i bshes gnyen des kyang mdo'i lung du ma drangs shing skyo ba dang /
T03D3820:293b-41: spro ba skyed par byed do //
T03D3820:294a-0: de nas skyo ba dang spro ba de yang rang @294a * //
T03D3820:294a-1: gi sems dran pa 'di yin no //
T03D3820:294a-2: dran pa 'di las rgal bar byed pa'i thabs ji lta bu yod ce na /
T03D3820:294a-3: de la dran pa'i chos rnams thabs su shes shing
T03D3820:294a-4: dran pas ma gos pa zab mo rnam pa gsum
T03D3820:294a-5: yin pas so // de bas na shes rab kyi
T03D3820:294a-6: pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i chos nyid ma
T03D3820:294a-7: rtogs par du smig rgyu'i chu bo dang 'dra ste
T03D3820:294a-8: yin pas so // / dran pa'i chos rnams bden te mi brdzun pas na'o //
T03D3820:294a-9: zab mo'i chos nyid dang phrad na smig rgyu'i chu stor ba dang 'dra ste /
T03D3820:294a-10: dran pas ma gos pa bden par shes par bya'o //
T03D3820:294a-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa /
T03D3820:294a-15: drag po'i sngags ma yin no //
T03D3820:294a-17: sngags 'di'i don rtogs pa tsam gyis sems grol ba yin no //
T03D3820:294a-18: sngags 'di'i dang po'i yi ge bzhi las byung ba dang /
T03D3820:294a-19: bar du yi ge bzhi'i don gsal bar bstan pa dang /
T03D3820:294a-20: tha ma sngags kyi don rnam pa bzhi la bsdus pas so //
T03D3820:294a-21: don bzhi po gang zhe na /
T03D3820:294a-26: tad ya th'a zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T03D3820:294a-27: ga te ga te ni phyin to phyin to zhes
T03D3820:294a-28: bya ba ni dran pa ma lus pa sgyu ma
T03D3820:294a-30: p'a ra ga te ni pha rol tu phyin to
T03D3820:294a-31: zhes bya ba ni dran pa'i pha rol na stong
T03D3820:294a-32: pa nyid la pha tu phyin to //
T03D3820:294a-33: p'a ra sam ga te ni pha rol tu yang
T03D3820:294a-34: dag par phyin to zhes bya bas ni sgyu ma
T03D3820:294a-35: lta bu dang / stong pa nyid kyi pha rol
T03D3820:294a-36: na mtshan ma med pa la pha rol tu yang
T03D3820:294a-38: bo dhi sv'a h'a byang chub tu gyur cig ces
T03D3820:294a-39: bya bas ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya thams
T03D3820:294a-40: cad byang nas blo las 'das pa'o //
T03D3820:294a-41: de dag gis ni rab tu mi gnas pa bzhi dang /
T03D3820:294a-43: ting nge 'dzin bzhi gtan la phab pa'o //
T03D3820:294a-44: de lta bu'i gdams ngag la nan tan bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3820:294a-45: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T03D3820:294a-46: pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3820:294a-47: pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba
T03D3820:294a-48: ni nan tan gyis shig ces gsungs pa'o //
T03D3820:294a-49: de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las
T03D3820:294a-50: bzhengs te zhes bya ba ni zab mo'i ting nge
T03D3820:294a-52: snyoms par bzhugs pa mi mnga' yang sems can rnams kyi snang ba la mnyam par gzhag pa dang /
T03D3820:294a-53: rjes la sa thob pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3820:294b-0: byang chub sems @294b dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la ni /
T03D3820:294b-1: dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3820:294b-2: dgongs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3820:294b-3: zab mo'i don ji lta ba bzhin du dgongs pa
T03D3820:294b-4: ma nor ba bstan pas thugs dgyes pas sangs rgyas
T03D3820:294b-5: kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs shing legs so zhes
T03D3820:294b-7: de bas kyang zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i
T03D3820:294b-8: ting nge 'dzin la dgongs pas legs so legs so
T03D3820:294b-10: rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te ni theg pa
T03D3820:294b-11: chen po'i rigs snang ba'i chos nyid la mos pa
T03D3820:294b-12: rnams kyi don du gsungs so //
T03D3820:294b-14: snang ba'i chos rnams kyis sems mi grol lo zhes pa'i brda'o //
T03D3820:294b-15: rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no zhes bya ba
T03D3820:294b-16: ni zab mo'i chos nyid rtogs na sems grol ba'i
T03D3820:294b-17: brda yin no // ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa
T03D3820:294b-18: bzhin du ni 'jig rten pa la ji srid gnas
T03D3820:294b-19: kyi bar du mang ba sgyu ma lta bu la
T03D3820:294b-21: 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa'i byang
T03D3820:294b-22: chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams
T03D3820:294b-23: kyi don la dgongs nas zab mo'i chos nyid 'ba'
T03D3820:294b-24: zhig la brten dgos pa yin no //
T03D3820:294b-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
T03D3820:294b-26: la spyad par bya ste ni rnam par grol ba'i
T03D3820:294b-27: lam la don du gnyer ba rnams kyis zab mo
T03D3820:294b-28: 'ba' zhig la brten dgos pas yang dang yang du
T03D3820:294b-29: lan grangs mang du gsungs so //
T03D3820:294b-30: zab mo'i don la mos par gyur pa'i dge pa'i
T03D3820:294b-31: bshes gnyen rnams la ni dus gsum du rnam par
T03D3820:294b-32: bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su
T03D3820:294b-33: yi rang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
T03D3820:294b-34: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
T03D3820:294b-35: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T03D3820:294b-36: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
T03D3820:294b-40: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
T03D3820:294b-41: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
T03D3820:294b-42: do zhes bya ba ni go sla bas bshad pa
T03D3820:294b-43: ma byas so // bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab
T03D3820:294b-44: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa
T03D3820:294b-45: don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba pandi ta phyag
T03D3820:294b-46: na rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T03D3820:295a-0: // / bal yul ye rang gi grong khyer du rje btsun bla ma dam pa @295a * //
T03D3820:295a-1: phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis chos zhus pa'i dus su /
T03D3820:295a-2: bla ma chos ston pham babs gnang ba'i nyin par
T03D3820:295a-3: bod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis mdo bton
T03D3820:295a-4: pa la / bla ma dam pas lo ts'a ba la khong 'don pa de ci yin gsungs pas /
T03D3820:295a-5: lo ts'a bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po lags zhus pas /
T03D3820:295a-6: 'o na bod du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3820:295a-7: phyin po'i snying po dar na sangs rgyas kyis lung
T03D3820:295a-8: bstan pa de bden pa yin no //
T03D3820:295a-9: snying po'i don gyi gdams ngag shes sam gsungs pa la /
T03D3820:295a-10: lo ts'a bas ma 'tshal zhes lan btab pa la /
T03D3820:295a-11: 'o na ngas khyed rnams la gdams ngag bstan gyis gsungs nas /
T03D3820:295a-12: snying po'i don gyi gdams ngag gnang ba zin ris bris nas nan tan byas pa yin no //
T03D3820:295a-13: bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi pad ma'i sbrang rtsi smyo chu 'thungs nas su /
T03D3820:295a-14: skye med bde chen bung ba smyon pa'i kha la su zhig mnyan du yod /
T03D3820:295a-15: gal te smyon pa'i tshig la bden pa yod srid thugs la dgongs nas su /
T03D3820:295a-16: mthun pa'i grogs po rnams kyis mi bden na yang don 'di dgongs par zhu /
T03D3820:295a-17: gal te stong pa thabs yin na //
T03D3820:295a-18: de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur //
T03D3820:295a-19: rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan med phyir //
T03D3820:295a-20: thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin //
T03D3820:295a-21: lta ba rnams las log rnams dang //
T03D3820:295a-22: bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyi //
T03D3820:295a-23: bdag tu 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i phyir //
T03D3820:295a-24: rgyal ba rnams kyis stong pa bstan //
T03D3820:295a-25: srid zhi mnyam nyid dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum //
T03D3820:295a-26: 'gro ba'i bde sgrub thabs mkhas ston par byed //
T03D3820:295a-27: gzhung gi bdag nyid rin chen lta bu la //
T03D3820:295a-28: dad dang gus pas yang yang phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3820:295a-29: phan sems spro dags bris pa'i 'grel pa 'di //
T03D3820:295a-30: gang zag dam pa rnams kyi phyag tu brgyud pa dang //
T03D3820:295a-31: bstan pa'i bya ba mdzad pa bdag gi smon lam yin //
T03D3820:295a-32: chos nyid bden pas de ltar 'grub gyur cig / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /
